channel.title: ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 run.bat Problem
channel.description:
OK. Me and my friend have been making this server. But somehow overnight (Or something we did accidently) we get this error.
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java369) at server.world.ItemHandler.(init)(ItemHandler.java:33) at server.Server.(clinit)(Server.java:67) [/code]
This is a Run.bat problem, not a Compiler problem
And have no idea what we did, or how to fix it!
Please help me, Thank you in advance!

item.description:
@Encryptic wrote:

Yes, I know Atomic…
But I had this problem in a previous experiment of mine where the Item.CFG file just causes problems from NO WHERE. lol
And I tried on that one, so this time I decided to ask first. Just incase I was searching for the wrong this. Ya know?

item.title: ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 run.bat Problem
item.dc:creator: @Encryptic Encryptic
item.description:
@Encryptic wrote:

Thank you atomic_
I had figured as much. but wasn’t entirely sure. wanted to ask the all knowing community first. lol

CLOSE THIS THREAD. PROBLEM HAS BEEN FIXED. AN ITEM HAD THE “ENTER” KEY PRESSED AFTER IT, DON’T KNOW WHY. IT WAS “PICTURE”.
CLOSE CLOSE CLOSEDDDDD

Read full topic

item.title: ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 run.bat Problem

item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Item.cfg

You fucked it up by not using tabs, using too many tabs, or something else of that nature.

OK. Me and my friend have been making this server. But somehow overnight (Or something we did accidently) we get this error.
